home_about:
Minecraft Questing Mod Localizer is a web application that helps you to localize quest files of Minecraft questing mods.
You can convert quest files to localizable format, translate quest files to other languages, and apply the translated quest files to the modpack.
This application supports FTB Quests and Better Questing.
home_new_title: Critical Changes in MC 1.21+ version of FTB Quests (WIP)
home_new_desc:
[Version 2100.1.0](https://github.com/FTBTeam/FTB-Quests/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#210010) has changed the way translations are handled. The translation text is now stored in `config/ftb_quests/quests/lang/xx_xx.snbt` file, no longer requiring additional `.json` files.

I am currently working on progress to support this change. You can check the progress on [this issue page](https://github.com/peunsu/mc-questing-mod-localizer/issues/33). Please be patient until the update is released.
deepl_key_caption:
Your API key is not stored anywhere and is only used for translation. **Do not share your API key with others.**

To get your API key, visit [DeepL API](https://www.deepl.com/pro-api) and sign up for a DeepL account.
deepl_key_error: The DeepL API key is empty or invalid. Please enter a valid DeepL API key.
deepl_key_check: Cannot start localization. Check if the valid DeepL API key is entered on the sidebar. Or you can use Google Translate instead.
header_add_manual: How to Add New Language Manually
select_task_label: What do you want to do?
select_task_convert: **Convert** the quest files to generate the language files and **translate it**.
select_task_convert_no_translate: **Convert** the quest files to generate the language files but **do not translate it**.
expander_select_task_label: I don't know what should I choose.
expander_select_task:
Open your modpack's quest files with your text editor and check out **the `title` (or `name`) and `description` values** of the quests.

If these values are **plain text**, the **first or second** option is recommended.

If these values are **formatted text like `modpack.quest.name`**, the **third** option is recommended.
expander_check_label: Where are the modpack's quest files and language files?
expander_check_ftbq:
The quest files (`.snbt`) are in the **`config/ftbquests/quests`** folder and the language files (`.json`) are in the **`kubejs/assets/kubejs/lang`** folder.

**The directory may vary depending on the modpack.**
expander_check_bqm:
The quest file (`DefaultQuests.json`) is in the **`config/betterquesting`** folder and the language files (`.lang`) are in the **`resources/betterquesting/lang`** folder.

**The directory may vary depending on the modpack.**
uploader_ftbq_quest: Upload all the quest files (`.snbt`) in the `config/ftbquests/quests` folder of the modpack to localize. [Max: {max} files]
uploader_bqm_quest: Upload the quest file (`DefaultQuests.json`) in the `config/betterquesting` folder of the modpack to localize.
uploader_ftbq_lang: Upload the language file (`.json`) in the `kubejs/assets/kubejs/lang` folder of the modpack to localize. The directory may vary depending on the modpack.
uploader_bqm_lang: Upload the language file (`.lang`) in the `resources/betterquesting/lang` folder of the modpack to localize. The directory may vary depending on the modpack.
uploader_help: You can upload multiple files at once by selecting multiple files in the file selection dialog.
uploader_exceed: You can upload **up to {max} file(s)** at once.
modpack_label: Enter the shortened name of the modpack. [Example: All the Mods 9 â†’ atm9]
modpack_help: This name will be used as the namespace for localization.
lang_check_label: Do you have a language file in the modpack? Check a language file in the `{dir}` folder of the modpack. The directory may vary depending on the modpack.
lang_check_help: If you have a language file, you can translate the existing language file into another language.
src_label: Select the language of the quests you uploaded.
src_help: This is the language of the quests you uploaded.
dest_label: Select the language you want to translate the quests into.
dest_help: This is the language you want to translate the quests into.
localize_help: Click this button to start localization.
convert_error: An error occurred while converting quests: {e}
translate_error: An error occurred while translating quests: {e}
translate_same_lang: The source language and the destination language are the same.
manual_ftbq_2: * Extract `quests.zip` and replace the original `.snbt` files in `config/ftbquests/quests` folder with the extracted files.
manual_bqm_2: * Replace the original `DefaultQuests.json` in `config/betterquesting` folder with the downloaded file.
manual_translated_lang_2: * Put `{src}.{ext}` and `{dest}.{ext}` in `{dir}` folder (or the folder where the original lang files are placed).
manual_translated_lang_3: * Done! If you want to fix mistranslated text, edit `{dest}.{ext}` with your text editor.
manual_lang_2: * Put `{src}.{ext}` in `{dir}` folder (or the folder where the original lang files are placed).
manual_lang_warning: **Do not change the key** of the `.{ext}` file. (e.g. `{example}`)
manual_custom_lang_3: * Translate the text in `{src}.{ext}` and put the translated text in `<language>.{ext}` with text editor. You may use this localization tool or any translator to translate the text.
manual_custom_lang_4: * Put `<language>.{ext}` in `{dir}` folder (or the folder where the original `{src}.{ext}` is located).
manual_custom_warning: The translated text should be put in **`<language>.{ext}`**, not in `{src}.{ext}`.
lang_link_help: Click this link to see the list of Minecraft languages.
